title: Fix Cloudflare Tunnel redirect loop
description:
Caddy causing ERR_TOO_MANY_REDIRECTS when accessed via Cloudflare Tunnel.

Problem:
- Cloudflare Tunnel provides HTTPS
- Caddy configured with domain tries to redirect HTTP->HTTPS
- Creates infinite redirect loop

Solution:
Update Caddyfile to listen on :80 without domain:
```
:80 {
    reverse_proxy host.docker.internal:5173
}
```

Location: /home/deploy/quiz-sprint/reverse-proxy/Caddyfile

Current URL: https://herb-pdt-medications-feof.trycloudflare.com
close_reason: Implemented SSH reverse tunnel from MacBook to VPS. Fixed CI/CD workflow with proper container management and health checks. Vite dev server accessible via HTTPS domain.
